title: XTEN, Austin Sandy, HMH, Handel, and DIGSAU are Archinect Jobs' latest featured employers
author: Nathaniel Bahadursingh
excerpt: In this week's curated employer highlight from Archinect Jobs, we are featuring five architecture and design firms with current openings in Los Angeles, Philadelphia, San Francisco/Alamo, and Boulder. For even more opportunities, visit the Archinect job board and...
text: In this week's curated employer highlight from Archinect Jobs, we are featuring five architecture and design firms with current openings in Los Angeles, Philadelphia, San Francisco/Alamo, and Boulder. For even more opportunities, visit the Archinect job board and explore our active community of job seekers, firms, and schools. Philadelphia-based architecture firm DIGSAU has an opening for an Architect or Designer with two to six years of experience and fluency in Revit, Rhino, AutoCAD, and Adobe Creative Suite. The ideal applicant will have experience in the preparation of drawing sets, excellent time management and organizational skills, and strong interpersonal skills. Basecamp Delta by DIGSAU.In Los Angeles, XTEN Architecture has two exciting positions available: a Junior Architect with a minimum of one to three years of experience and a Project Architect with a minimum of five years of experience. The Junior Architect should have excellent conceptual diagramming, 3D modeling, rendering, and presentation skills, as well as Schematic Design, Design Development and Construction Drawing experience. The Project Architect must possess leadership experience through DD, CD and CA phases, along with experience meeting independently with clients and consultants. Both roles require proficiency with AutoCAD, Revit, Rhino, and Adobe Creative Suite. The Junior Architect should also be proficient with Enscape/V-Ray. Surfhouse by XTEN Architecture.Handel Architects is looking to add a Project Architect (7-10 years exp) and a Project Architect (5–7 years exp) to its office in San Francisco. Both roles require experience with Revit, Adobe Creative Suite, and 3D modeling/rendering tools, along with experience in Construction Administration and producing construction document sets. The positions also call for a strong knowledge of planning and building codes and strong written and verbal communication skills. The Project Architect with seven to ten years of experience should have expertise in façade design, enclosure, and waterproofing detailing. Enclave at the Cathedral by Handel Architects. Photo: David PalerBoulder-based design studio HMH Architecture & Interiors is in search of an Architect / Project Manager with eight or more years of experience and proficiency with materials, specifications, construction detailing, critical thinking, and problem solving. Applicants should have experience in complete project delivery, including managing construction documents through all architectural phases. One should also have experience in managing complicated land use and permitting with detailed knowledge of building codes. Cantilever House by HMH Architecture & Interiors. Photo: David Lauer PhotographyIn Alamo, California, Austin Sandy Architects is seeking an Architect / Designer with seven to ten years of experience and proficiency with Revit. Strong candidates will have commercial experience and will be eager to collaborate and solve complex challenges. Eastshore Infill by Austin Sandy Architects.If you don't already, follow Archinect on Instagram, Facebook, X, Pinterest, LinkedIn, Threads, and BlueSky, as well as on our dedicated Archinect Jobs Instagram, Facebook, X, and Threads feeds.
html:
In this week's curated employer highlight from Archinect Jobs, we are featuring five architecture and design firms with current openings in Los Angeles, Philadelphia, San Francisco/Alamo, and Boulder.

For even more opportunities, visit the Archinect job board and explore our active community of job seekers, firms, and schools.

Philadelphia-based architecture firm DIGSAU has an opening for an Architect or Designer with two to six years of experience and fluency in Revit, Rhino, AutoCAD, and Adobe Creative Suite. The ideal applicant will have experience in the preparation of drawing sets, excellent time management and organizational skills, and strong interpersonal skills.

In Los Angeles, XTEN Architecture has two exciting positions available: a Junior Architect with a minimum of one to three years of experience and a Project Architect with a minimum of five years of experience. The Junior Architect should have excellent conceptual diagramming, 3D modeling, rendering, and presentation skills, as well as Schematic Design, Design Development and Construction Drawing experience. The Project Architect must possess leadership experience through DD, CD and CA phases, along with experience meeting independently with clients and consultants. Both roles require proficiency with AutoCAD, Revit, Rhino, and Adobe Creative Suite. The Junior Architect should also be proficient with Enscape/V-Ray.

Handel Architects is looking to add a Project Architect (7-10 years exp) and a Project Architect (5–7 years exp) to its office in San Francisco. Both roles require experience with Revit, Adobe Creative Suite, and 3D modeling/rendering tools, along with experience in Construction Administration and producing construction document sets. The positions also call for a strong knowledge of planning and building codes and strong written and verbal communication skills. The Project Architect with seven to ten years of experience should have expertise in façade design, enclosure, and waterproofing detailing.

Boulder-based design studio HMH Architecture & Interiors is in search of an Architect / Project Manager with eight or more years of experience and proficiency with materials, specifications, construction detailing, critical thinking, and problem solving. Applicants should have experience in complete project delivery, including managing construction documents through all architectural phases. One should also have experience in managing complicated land use and permitting with detailed knowledge of building codes.

In Alamo, California, Austin Sandy Architects is seeking an Architect / Designer with seven to ten years of experience and proficiency with Revit. Strong candidates will have commercial experience and will be eager to collaborate and solve complex challenges.

If you don't already, follow Archinect on Instagram, Facebook, X, Pinterest, LinkedIn, Threads, and BlueSky, as well as on our dedicated Archinect Jobs Instagram, Facebook, X, and Threads feeds.
